clock_pin.docs:
**, [Pin Schema](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-pin-schema)**: The pin which CLK is connected to.

*See also: [sm2335 Component/Hub](https://esphome.io/components/output/sm2335.html#configuration-variables)*

data_pin.docs:
**, [Pin Schema](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-pin-schema)**: The pin used for DATA.

*See also: [sm2335 Component/Hub](https://esphome.io/components/output/sm2335.html#configuration-variables)*

max_power_color_channels.docs:
**, int 0-15**: Adjusts the current supplied to the color channels, higher is more power.  Default is 2 per SM2335 datasheet. See table below.

*See also: [sm2335 Component/Hub](https://esphome.io/components/output/sm2335.html#configuration-variables)*

max_power_white_channels.docs:
**, int 0-15**: Adjusts the current supplied to the white channels, higher is more power.  Default is 4 per SM2335 datasheet. See table below.

*See also: [sm2335 Component/Hub](https://esphome.io/components/output/sm2335.html#configuration-variables)*
